title: Premier League stars urge fans to stay at home to fight Covid-19
description: Premier League players including Harry Maguire, Cesar Azpilicueta and Trent Alexander-Arnold urge fans to stay at home during the coronavirus outbreak.
content: Premier League players including Harry Maguire, Cesar Azpilicueta and Trent Alexander-Arnold urge fans to stay at home during the coronavirus outbreak.
